https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ob3l78DvJjmU4wVETv7l60HGvux.jpg Two stories unfold over the same long, hot day in Acapulco. The first involves Fernanda, who is forced to deal with the emergence of her ex-lover. Her boyfriend must compete with the sexual tension they share. The second concerns Jamie, a worker attempting suicide, until a girl disrupts his plan. Drama/Mex
